original_text: Now when Pharaoh heard this thing, he sought to slay Moses. But Moses fled from the face of Pharaoh, and dwelt in the land of Midian: and he sat down by a well.
korean_text: 바로가 이 일을 듣고 모세를 죽이고자 하여 찾는지라 모세가 바로의 낯을 피하여 미디안 땅에 머물며 하루는 우물 곁에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: Now when Pharaoh heard this thing
But Moses fled from the face of Pharaoh
and dwelt in the land of Midian
and he sat down by a well
